courseSectionInformation: 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: IB 302; or consent of instructor.
description: Classification, diversity, structure, function, ecology, behavior and evolution of amphibians and reptiles. Laboratory devoted to anatomy and identification. Offered in alternate years. 4 undergraduate hours. 4 graduate hours. Prerequisite: IB 302; or consent of instructor.
label: Herpetology
